StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEmail]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @LeadID uniqueiden..er, @EmailAddressTypeID int )
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [EmailAddressID], [Email], [DateUpdated] FROM [dbo].[EmailAddress] WHERE LeadID = @LeadID AND EmailAddressTypeID = @EmailAddressTypeID AND IsCurrent = 'True'
